description: Number of bracelets (turn over necklaces) of n beads of 2 colors, 7 of them black.
comments: From _Vladimir Shevelev_, Apr 23 2011: (Start)Also number of nonequivalent necklaces of 7 beads each of them painted by one of n colors.The sequence solves the so-called Reis problem about convex k-gons in case k=7 (see our comment to A032279).(End)
